results.name: a(n) = A032742(A249818(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
formula: a(n) = A249818(n) / A020639(n). [Because A249818 preserves the smallest prime factor of n.]
xref: Differs from related A280495 and A280497 for the first time at n=33, where a(33) = 15, while A280495(33) = A280497(33) = 13.
Differs from related A280496 for the first time at n=42, where a(42) = 21, while A280496(42) = 27.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 09 2017
